structure.unit: LEVY AND ASSESSMENT OF PROPERTY TAXES

law.catch_line: Assessment of property of property valuation administrator and his deputies.
law.text: The property valuation administrator shall assess his own property and that of his deputies, and shall be governed by the laws applicable to the assessment of the property of other taxpayers. The county board of assessment appeals shall review the assessment of the property of the property valuation administrator and his deputies.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 176, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1949 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 9. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4069.
